content: can you believe this blanket is made 100% from recycled plastic bottles yep wrap yourself up in a plastic bottle i bet you never thought of doing that before well think twice because this throw blanket is so soft and so warm made completely of double_crochet row and double_crochet cluster row it comes super quick and easy like the quickest blanket i ve ever made quick and the color combinations are endless pick your faves and get ready to cozy up under this misty peaks throw blanket upon purchase you will receive a 6-page pdf document ready for download the pattern is incredibly approachable and includes lots of pictures to help you visualize along the way i am always available to help as well this pattern is written in us terms the throw blanket measures approximately 50 x 50 materials needed -yarn weight 6/super bulky -hook 9 00mm / us m/n -tapestry needle -stitch markers -scissors abbreviations used chain - chain st - stitch skip - skip hk - hook fdc - foundation double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet increase - increase - number of stitches in row x - repeat instructions indicated number of times this pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced sold distributed or translated without authorization from off the beaten hook you can sell your finished items provided that you credit off the beaten hook as the designer but you may not use my photos for your listing thank you for your respectfulness thank you for supporting my small business when you support a small business you support a dream join the off the beaten hook community for lots of free patterns video tutorials and tons of downloadable crochet resources blog https //offthebeatenhook com/ instagram https //www instagram com/offthebeatenhook/ etsy https //www etsy com/shop/offthebeatenhook
